'''"Aligned" Volcanic Stone Stool''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Aligned" Volcanic Stone Stool is obtainable from a Remarkable Chest in [[Natlan]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in {{Location|Ancient Sacred Mountain}} after defeating enemies:{{verify}} {{Enemy List|Qucusaurus;Qucusaurus Chick;Tenebrous Mimesis - Qucusaurus Warrior: Blazing Sky;Tenebrous Mimesis - Qucusaurus Warrior: Heartstar Hammer}}
